entry.title: Blogs: Backstage Beauty at Mackage Fall 2012

link.Abstract: A cool-girl look dubbed "Friday Night" demands only three items in your makeup kit: concealer, black eyeliner, and a bit of mascara. Read the inspiration here then try the Mackage Fall 2012 look on yourself!
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Blogs: Backstage beauty at Mackage Fall 2012
link.title: Blogs: Backstage beauty at Mackage Fall 2012

link.Abstract: Mega-model Heather Marks and 'Zombie Boy' competed with Mackage's cool-kid coats for buzzworthy-ness on the runway - the Canadian fashion brand's leather pants, jackets, and oversized neck wear naturally came out on top.
link.title: Photos: Mackage -- Toronto Fashion Week Fall 2012

entry.content: A cool-girl look dubbed "Friday Night" demands only three items in your makeup kit: concealer, black eyeliner, and a bit of mascara. Read the inspiration here then try the Mackage Fall 2012 look on yourself!

link.Abstract: While her latest commercial may look like she's the latest face for Armani's lingerie collection, it's anything but.
link.title: While her latest commercial may look like she's the latest face for Armani's lingerie collection, it's anything but.

link.Abstract: According to The Daily Mail, Riri is the current favourite to star in an upcoming Houston biopic, with Grammy tribute singer Jennifer Hudson, Vivica A. Fox and Jordin Sparks also up for the part.

link.Abstract: RiRi is reportedly backing up her "Birthday Cake" remix collaborator's claims that he didn't steal a fan's cell phone.
link.title: Rihanna Reportedly Supporting Chris Brown by Ignoring Reality

link.Abstract: According to a police report, Chris Brown called a fan a b*tch before stealing her iPhone outside of a Miami club.
link.title: Chris Brown Could Face Jail after Allegedly Stealing a Woman's iPhone

entry.title: Blog: Jason Wu's Target Collection in Toronto

link.Abstract: Stylish Torontonians were able to scoop up some of the latest looks from the Jason Wu for Target collection at a one-day popup store.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: John Morioka, Senior Vice President of Merchandising for Target Canada, Bullseye and Jason Wu take a "pawse" at the Target one-day only pop-up store in downtown Toronto featuring the Jason Wu for Target collection, which sold out in less than five hours. Target donated an amount equal to 100 percent of the sales from the event to United Way Toronto.
link.title: John Morioka, Senior Vice President of Merchandising for Target Canada, Bullseye and Jason Wu take a "pawse" at the Target one-day only pop-up store in downtown Toronto featuring the Jason Wu for Target collection, which sold out in less than five hours.

entry.content: Stylish Torontonians were able to scoop up some of the latest looks from the Jason Wu for Target collection at a one-day popup store.

entry.title: Nathalie Atkinson on Karl Lagerfeld's Fat Flap

link.Abstract: Earlier this week, an old man with a heavily starched collar and powdered hair was interviewed about the headlines of the day by a free daily commuter paper. Among other things, he said that Greeks and Italians have disgusting habits, and that Russian men are ugly. He also said that while British singer Adele "has a beautiful face and a divine voice," she's "a little too fat."
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: If Lagerfeld finds Adele a little too fat for his fashion, there's an obvious simple solution: maybe he should just design something in her size.
link.title: Adele

link.Abstract: Adele shot down rumours that her new boyfriend, Simon Konecki, is married with a kid.
link.title: Adele Blogs About New Boyfriend: What Else Do We Know About This Guy?

link.Abstract: Adele will play the BRIT Awards on Feb. 21, buoying hopes that the "Someone Like You" singer might also perform at the Grammy Awards Feb. 12.
link.title: Adele Making Comeback at BRIT Awards; Will She Be Well Enough for a Grammy Gig, Too?

link.Abstract: Since 2003, Chanel has launched an annual Métiers d'Art collection in addition to its prêt-à-porter and Haute Couture collections. Check out images from the runway in Paris, France as head designer and creative director Karl Lagerfeld presents this year's 'Paris-Bombay' collection, which was inspired by India.
link.title: Photos: Chanel -- Pre-Fall 2012 Collection

link.Abstract: Karl Lagerfeld showed his Spring 2012 collection for French fashion house Chanel during Paris Fashion Week. The runway was transformed into an undersea kingdom and the show featured a performance by Florence Welch of Florence and the Machine.
link.title: Photos: Chanel -- Paris Fashion Week Spring 2012

entry.content: Earlier this week, an old man with a heavily starched collar and powdered hair was interviewed about the headlines of the day by a free daily commuter paper. Among other things, he said that Greeks and Italians have disgusting habits, and that Russian men are ugly. He also said that while British singer Adele "has a beautiful face and a divine voice," she's "a little too fat."

entry.title: Photos: Best Beauty Trends at the SAG Awards

link.Abstract: Check out our round-up of the best beauty trends on the SAG red carpet, plus our fave products to get the same look on you!
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: 'Raspberry kisses' no longer deserve a rude sub-context, and should relate to Emma Stone at the SAG Awards instead. Subbing out red, pink and orange for a modern rasperry is on-trend for the new season and a move we'd expect from none other than this timely starlet. Ms. Stone knows it, and Daphne Guinness knows it too - this beautiful berry shade called 'Narcissus' ($22) is from her collab with M.A.C. Cosmetics.
link.title: Best of SAG beauty

link.Abstract: The stars hit the carpet on Jan. 29 for the 2012 SAG Awards. Use the star rating below each photo to vote for the red carpet’s best dressed.
link.title: Rate the Fashion: 2012 SAG Awards

link.Abstract: The stars dressed to the nines for the 2012 SAG Awards -- but did you notice the stars’ accessories and details? Take a closer look!
link.title: Photos: 2012 SAG Awards -- The Details You May Have Missed!

entry.content: Check out our round-up of the best beauty trends on the SAG red carpet, plus our fave products to get the same look on you!

entry.title: How Online Shopping is Changing Fashion

link.Abstract: Online shopping for fashion is no longer about deals. Now, it's driven by convenience and personalization.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Online shops such as ShoeMint creats a personalized experience that many are choosing over bricks-and-mortar shopping.
link.title: ShoeMint

link.Abstract: The dainty intimates are on the rise thanks to Kate Middleton's penchant for them. Couple that with ultra-fashion-forward stars like Rihanna, Katy Perry, and Jessie J wearing sheer black hosiery, and you have a burgeoning trend.
link.title: Pantyhose regains a toehold

link.Abstract: For jewelers, entertainment award season is priceless advertising -- if their baubles are worn.
link.title: Jewelers seek out red carpet exposure

entry.content: Online shopping for fashion is no longer about deals. Now, it's driven by convenience and personalization.

entry.title: Video Contest Kicks Retro Up a Notch

link.Abstract: What could videos of an Alberta man running barefoot in the streets in a skirt; a Halifax teenager doing a chicken dance on a street corner in a tutu; and an Ontario high school student with a fear of heights ziplining across a ravine possibly have in common?
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Brothers Steve, left, and Ron Sedlbauer, took the Cougar brand, which found success with the pillow boot under their father and uncle, and started anew.
link.title: Brothers Steve, left, and Ron Sedlbauer, took the Cougar brand, which found success with the pillow boot under their father and uncle, and started anew.

entry.title: Fashion in 2012: Call it the Lady Gaga Factor

link.Abstract: Shoes, baubles, makeup, hairstyles, colours and textures will all shout "look at me!" in 2012.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Hot: coloured denim Not: Mom jeans Colour, not shape, is what makes denim hot this year. This winter, look for cobalt blue, emerald green, red and, of course, tangerine. Spring will bring denim in turquoise, yellow, violet and pink. What doesn’t matter is the silhouette. Skinny or flared, high-waisted or navel-baring, take your pick, as long as it’s in colour.
link.title: Fashion predictions for 2012

entry.title: The Kardashians Are About to Become Barbie's Besties

link.Abstract: According to Kim Kardashian's Twitter, her and her sisters are going to be turned into Barbie's new doll pals.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: The three Kardashian ladies (Kim, Kourtney and Khloe), are about to make Ken feel a bit funny in his plastic molded parts, because they're about to become Barbie's new besties.
link.title: The three Kardashian ladies (Kim, Kourtney and Khloe), are about to make Ken feel a bit funny in his plastic molded parts, because they're about to become Barbie's new besties.

link.title: Photos: Kim Kardashian's Best/Worst Looks

link.Abstract: Amber Rose claims the 808s & Heartbreak rapper cheated on her with the reality star, who was dating NFL athlete Reggie Bush at the time.
link.title: Kanye West's Ex Claims He Cheated on Her With Kim Kardashian

link.Abstract: According to reports, a former nanny for the Kardashian-Jenner family is shopping a new tell-all book.
link.title: Is There a New Kardashian Tell-All Book in the Works?

link.Abstract: Kim Kardashian is slamming rumours that she went to Haiti for a fashion show.
link.title: Kim Kardashian Sets the Record Straight About Her Trip to Haiti

link.Abstract: According to an eyewitness, West and the soon to be divorced Kardashian were doing more than playing the fame game at billionaire Rob Burkie's after-party.
link.title: Kanye West Reportedly Ate Kim Kardashian Up "Like She Was A Piece Of Cake" At Watch the Throne After-Party

link.Abstract: 39 days after ending his 72-day marriage to Kim Kardashian, Kris Humphries gave his first interview, appearing on Good Morning America.
link.title: Kris Humphries Does First Interview Since Kardashian Split: I Just Want to Make Cookies With My Mom

link.Abstract: According to reports, we could be seeing two - or more - new shows based on the Kardashians.
